jirleech wrote:

>
> I am just curious if there is a way to multithread Heritrix when
> crawling a single site.

Not reliably (There is the 'valence' feature on Frontier but its 
problematic even after help from members of this list).

>
> Also there was a post about embedding heritrix without having to call
> Heritrix.main(args[])
> Has there been any further progress with this?

There's been some progress.  Configuration and needed files are read off 
the CLASSPATH now.  You can get an instance of heritrix in your JVM by 
doing 'new Heritrix()'.    Call #start on it to get an idling instance 
or call launch with pointers to an order file to make it crawl a job 
(This code is in HEAD, not in the 1.2.0 release).  To be done is better 
macro-level API for control and for gettting status.  What do you need?
